questions.question: Which of the following functions can be approximated using Gauss Quadrature methods?
The integration by Gauss quadrature methods using three points is given by

answers.a: $$ I \ = \ a\left(\frac{5}{9}f\left(a*\sqrt{\frac{3}{5}} + b \right) \ + \ \frac{8}{9}f(a*0 \ + \ b) \ + \ \frac{5}{9}f\left(-a*\sqrt{\frac{3}{5}} + b \right) \right) \ $$
answers.b: $$ I \ = \ a\left(\frac{9}{5}f\left(a*\sqrt{\frac{5}{3}} + b \right) \ + \ \frac{9}{8}f(a*0 \ + \ b) \ + \ \frac{9}{5}f\left(-a*\sqrt{\frac{5}{3}} + b \right) \right) \ $$
answers.c: $$ I \ = \ \frac{5}{9}f\left(a*\sqrt{\frac{3}{5}} + b \right) \ + \ \frac{8}{9}f(a*0 \ + \ b) \ + \ \frac{5}{9}f\left(-a*\sqrt{\frac{3}{5}} + b \right) \ $$
